# VS Code folder
.vscode/

# ASP.NET Core files
bin/
obj/
wwwroot/

# .NET Core specific files
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Appsettings files
appsettings.json
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Production.json
appsettings.Staging.json

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.userprefs

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows Installer files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Desktop.ini

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# MacOS files
*.swp
*~
